{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNR2000 |revision=v1 |asin= |fcc_date=05/15/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY308200083 |ic_id=4054A-08200083 |pcb_id=2976310105 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9132 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205DMI |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622FTP-D43 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9132 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9103 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8216 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:1F:33, 00:22:3F, 00:24:B2 |oui_eth=00:1F:33, 00:22:3F, 00:24:B2 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNR2000v1|vs_id=2614}} "2976310105" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr2000 ''WNR2000 series'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] Per the OpenWrt wiki, one antenna (the middle one) may be disabled :(and thus the device would be running with a 2x2 configuration). *{{TechInfoDepot|Netgear_WNR2000_v1.0}} ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/30615-netgear-wnr2000-wireless-n-router-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=18279&p=1 ''WNR2000'' on the '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=39928 ''WNR2000'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] ===Specifications=== *[https://kb.netgear.com/23897/Comparison-between-different-versions-of-WNR2000 Comparison between different versions of WNR2000] 
Model		WNR2000v1	WNR2000v2	WNR2000v3	WNR2000v4
Power		12V/1A		12V/1A		12V/1A		12V/1A
Processor	Atheros  	Broadcom 	Atheros 	Atheros 
(CPU)		AR9132  	BCM4716B0  	AR7240  	AR9341
Freq.		(400MHz)	(300MHz)	(400MHz)	(500MHz)
Flash		4MB		4MB		4MB		4MB
RAM		32MB		32MB		32 MB		32MB
WLAN 		Atheros  	Broadcom 	Atheros 	Atheros
Chip		AR9132/AR9103  	BCM4716B0	AR9287		AR9341
Wireless	B/G/N		B/G/N		B/G/N		B/G/N
Switch 		Atheros  	Broadcom 	Atheros 	Atheros
Chip		AR9132		BCM5325E	AR7240		AR9341
LAN speed	10/100		10/100		10/100		10/100
WAN/LAN		1/4		1/4		1/4		1/4
USB ports	None		None		None		None
